text: The Riddarholmen Church () is a church building in Stockholm, Sweden. It belongs to the Church of Sweden. It is on the island of Riddarholmen. Several Swedish monarchs are buried here. It is one of the oldest building in Stockholm, and dates back to the Middle Ages. ==Other websites== * The Riddarholmen Church at the Royal Court's website Category:Church of Sweden churches Category:Churches in Stockholm Category:13th-century buildings and structures
title: Riddarholmen Church
